Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of September 13, 2024 ▪️ At least two...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of September 13, 2024▪️ At least two dozen UAVs - Geranium - struck the enemy’s rear areas at night. Explosions were reported in Odessa, Ilyichevsk, Nikolaev, Kherson, Zaporozhye, Ivano-Frankivsk and Vinnitsa regions.▪️ In the Kursk region, the flank attack of the Russian Armed Forces continues, ours advanced from the west to the Lyubimovka-Tolsty Lug-Daryino line, liberating more than 10 settlements. At the same time, the enemy remains active near Cherkasy Porechny, without abandoning attempts to advance. In addition, for the previous two days, the Ukrainian Armed Forces have been taking actions to break through the border in the south of the Glushkovsky district in the area of ​​the settlement. New Path - Vesyoloye, using engineering barrier vehicles (one destroyed) and armored vehicles. The situation on this section of the front remains tense, but controlled. The enemy's plan is to break through to the settlement. and the Glushkovo railway station to go to the rear of our troops advancing from the flank to the Sudzhansky district. Cautious reports are beginning to appear about the depletion of the Ukrainian Armed Forces' reserves and the lack of rotation among the enemy, which, however, has almost no effect on the intensity of hostilities.▪️ In Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk), battles are taking place with varying success in the western part of Microdistrict No. 1▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces were destroyed several bridges in the near rear of the enemy. There was information about the withdrawal of Ukrainian Armed Forces units from Ukrainsk in order to avoid encirclement. Fighting continues in Grodovka, north of Novogrodovka; on the eastern outskirts of Lysovka, Russian maneuver groups continue their attacking actions. The Ukrainian Armed Forces carried out a counterattack northeast of Novogrodovka, landing troops in the Orlovka area, which indicates that the enemy reserves who had arrived had entered the battle. To the south, to the west of Krasnogorovka, the Russian Armed Forces launched a large-scale attack on Ostroye, using, according to enemy estimates, up to 46 units of equipment. In heavy battles, we managed to significantly expand the zone of control near Krasnogorovka, but the enemy reports that he still managed to hold back our onslaught on Ostroye.▪️ High-intensity battles are taking place in the Ugledar area. Protvinik brought up its reserves. There are reports of fighting in Zolotaya Niva and near Prechistovka▪️ In the Kherson region - shelling of the Armed Forces of Ukraine of New Kakhovka. The Central Market came under attack, with at least 11 arrivals. One civilian was killed, eight people (six women, two men) were injured.▪️ 6 enemy aircraft-type UAVs were destroyed over the Bryansk region overnight. ▪️ In the Belgorod region in the Shebekinsky urban district, the village of Novaya Tavolzhanka came under fire. In the Borisovsky district in the village of Berezovka, after two explosive devices were dropped from a UAV, the roof of a private household was damaged.▪️ In the DPR in the Nikitovsky district of Gorlovka, when an explosive object was dropped from a VFU drone onto a car, three employees of the DPR State Unitary Enterprise -Komtel- became victims: two men born in 1983 and 1977 .r. another man born in 1963 was injured. died in the hospital. Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: counterattacks of the Russian army in the Sudzhansky and Korenevsky districts situation towards the end on September 12, 2024 In the Kursk region, Russian units are building on the success of the previous days, displacing the Armed Forces of Ukraine from many previously occupied settlements.🔻In the Korenevsky district, the Russian Armed Forces cleared a settlement Krasnooktyabrskoe. The Russian troops received an abandoned International MaxxPro armored car as a trophy. The enemy also attacked an assault group in the Vishnevka area with a drone, and later its release was reported to the Russian Ministry of Defense. And in Snagosti, a squad of Ukrainian fighters fell into an organized ambush on the southern outskirts of the village: a minibus, along with members of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, was shot at point-blank range from an RPG.▪️In addition, Russian troops liberated Obukhovka and advanced in the direction of the Pokrovsky farm, Sudzhansky district. The enemy was driven out of the outskirts of Byakhovo, Gordeevka, Vnezapny and Viktorovka. At the same time, further north in Olgovka, fighting is still ongoing, where the Russian Armed Forces are repelling attempts by the Armed Forces of Ukraine to penetrate deep into the Russian defense.🔻In the Glushkovsky district, Ukrainian formations continue to unsuccessfully attack in the direction of the outskirts of the settlements of Medvezhye and Novy Put. The last mine clearing vehicle IMR-2 even managed to drive several hundred meters before it hit a mine. Currently, fighting continues in the area of ​​the state border line, the enemy’s attempts to gain a foothold in the villages have been thwarted. In the Sudzhansky district, Russian infantry fighting vehicles shot at point-blank Ukrainian positions in Russkaya Konopelka, at the moment the village is for the most part under the control of the Russian Armed Forces. Fighting continues in the Martynovka and Fanaseevka areas.▪️The enemy published footage of shelling of Russian positions in the Malaya Lokni area. However, due to the absence of destruction in the village in the published video, most likely the footage is archival. Title: 🇷🇺🇸🇾🪖 Again about the -Syrian experience- in the RF Armed Fo...
Description: 🇷🇺🇸🇾🪖 Again about the -Syrian experience- in the RF Armed Forces. The expression -Syrian experience- has long become a household word in the troops and a synonym for the harmfulness of certain competencies. Which sometimes leads to the conclusion that the campaign in Syria was useless from the point of view of gaining practical skills and combat training. It is still worth noting here that the fighting in the Syrian Arab Republic itself was an excellent opportunity to test domestic weapons, control systems and skills personnel - even the top officials spoke openly about this. The question is who learned what. If the distribution of humanitarian aid in Maaloula, patrolling in a convoy of Tyfunovs and BTR-82A, TsPVS and grinning at the Syrian slippers was taken as the Syrian experience, then he really could not help but turn out to be stupid. However, not everyone did this.📌 For example, the backbone of the same PMC - Wagner - was formed in Syria. Under almost the same conditions, they were able to gain a completely different experience and scale it to their training system. As a result, in 2022, they adapted much faster than others to the new realities on the battlefield. As Alexander Kharchenko noted, without the Syrian campaign, by the beginning of the Northern Military District, we would not have had not only -Lancets- and -Krasnopolei-, but even -Orlans-. And we would have to be content with the limited experience of Donbass, which the Russian Armed Forces during the years of the Minsk agreements assimilated even more poorly. In this context, by the way, it’s time to ask another question: how are things going with the centralized systematization of the experience of 2022-2024? And are past mistakes actually taken into account in shaping feedback to avoid similar problems in the future? #VSRF #Russia #Syria@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇮🇱🇮🇷🇸🇾 Israeli media writes about the alleged kidnapping of...
Description: 🇮🇱🇮🇷🇸🇾 About the alleged kidnapping of Iranian officers in Syria by the IDF, Israeli media write that simultaneously with the recent massive air raid on the city of Masyaf in the Syrian province of Hama, a ground operation was carried out, during which several Iranian officers were kidnapped from the territory of the Research Center. Allegedly, after fighter strikes, Israeli helicopters entered the territory of the Arab Republic, landed troops in the area of ​​the research institute and captured from two to four senior officers from the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps. Then the object was mined.▪️The primary source of the news was the Syrian opposition channel Syria TV broadcasting from Turkey. He referred to some exclusive data and information leaks, but no confirmation of what happened was provided. Neither the IDF press service nor official Syrian and Iranian resources confirmed the fact of the operation. The only thing you can rely on is rumors about helicopters flying in Tartus in the direction of Masyaf, dating back to the time of the air attack.🔻And although it is not known for certain what actually happened, with a high degree of probability there are reports of an IDF landing operation with the kidnapping of Iranian military personnel is an injection of supporters of the Syrian Spring. Title: 🇺🇸🇬🇧💰On the decline of the era of decentralized crypto The p...
Description: 🇺🇸🇬🇧💰On the decline of the era of decentralized crypto The process of introducing financial control mechanisms in the crypto industry is almost complete. All issuers and/or platforms in the Anglo-Saxon circuit are either directly accountable to the SEC and IRA (US Internal Revenue Service) or are secretly collaborating with the CIA. ▪️US and British intelligence services have obligated all crypto exchanges to implement KYC and AML systems over the past two years.▪️Vivid examples are the cases of FTX and Binance. In both cases, the creators and managers of crypto-platforms ended up in prison. And if in the case of FTX the fate of the site has not yet been determined, then in the case of Binance, the exchange simply received a leader loyal to the authorities and was integrated into the financial system of the Anglo-Saxon circuit.▪️The most stringent regulation is being implemented in the EU. They adopted a set of documents regulating the circulation of MICA crypto-assets. In parallel, the EU also adopted the Digital Services Act (DSA). Came into force on February 17, 2024. 🔻The fruits of crypto-democracy There has been a real hunt for Russians in the field of finance and crypto for a long time. The most resonant cases: ▪️Arrest of the head of the BTC Banker bot Anatoly Legkodymov in the USA. The founder and largest co-owner of the service was accused of fraud of $700 million and received a real sentence. The very wording of the indictment is interesting, which states that the owner of the service was aware that his platform was being used for illegal activities. ▪️Tornado Cash creator Alexey Pertsev was recently detained in the Netherlands, accused of money laundering through his platform and received 64 months in prison.▪️Pavel Lerner, who was previously kidnapped for ransom in Kyiv in 2017, was arrested in Spain in 2023.▪️ On December 14, 2023, French police detained a Russian at Paris airport based solely on suspicion of links to the hacker group Hive. His name and current status are not mentioned in open sources.▪️This list complements the report of the detention in Argentina of a Russian who is suspected of collaborating with the North Korean Lazarus group and receiving income from illegal activities. The name of the suspect has not been disclosed, the wording of the charges is as vague as possible.▪️The high-profile case of Alexander Vinnik (BTC-E exchange), who was arrested in Greece for using a crypto exchange to allegedly launder more than $9 billion, ended in extradition to the United States.▪️In this context, the story of the arrest of Pavel Durov no longer looks like an exception.🔻Who are the beneficiaries? The colossal resources of Western intelligence services aimed at regulating the issue and circulation of digital assets indicate a direct order from large financial players. And the largest player in this field is BlackRock and affiliated structures.BlackRock IBIT became the world's largest institutional holder of Bitcoin with 357,509 Bitcoin as of September 1, 2024, according to the latest data from HODL15Capital. By comparison, stablecoin giant Tether is in fifth place with 75,354 bitcoins. The efforts of these and other large companies are aimed at creating an interface for the integration of the crypto market and traditional finance, which is impossible without the introduction of generally accepted financial control mechanisms. This will allow the sale of high-risk crypto products to fairly conservative stock market investors in an ETF shell and will launch the process of a large-scale flow of investments from traditional financial instruments to crypto. BlackRock management clearly wants to make money on this. #globalism #crypto #economics@rybar together with @econopovalypseSupport usProject -Rybar -How US intelligence agencies seize control of the crypto market Now official - Tether is collaborating with the FBI, the US Internal Revenue Service (IRS), the US Department of Justice ( DOJ) and other regulatory authorities.

Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Alexander-Kalinovsky direction: fighting in the Dzerzhinsk agglomeration and advance in Nelepovkasituation as of 17:00 on September 12, 2024 Russian troops continue to break into Ukrainian defenses in the Dzerzhinsk agglomeration. Units of the Russian Armed Forces are conducting assault operations in dense urban areas, getting closer and closer to the center of Dzerzhinsk.▪️Almost all of Druzhba, with the exception of the northernmost street, has come under the control of Russian troops. Simultaneously with the liberation of Druzhba, the fighting in Kirovo is coming to its logical conclusion, where several streets on the western outskirts remain under the control of the Ukrainian Armed Forces: Russian troops have entrenched themselves on Shcherbinovskaya, 3rd International and Tchaikovsky streets. After their capture, the opportunity will open up to advance both further along the railway in the direction of Dachnoye and to the southwest, taking the enemy garrison in Dzerzhinsk in pincers from the flank.▪️To the south there are battles in Dzerzhinsk. Russian troops took control of microdistrict No. 1 at the entrance to the city, occupied the territory of the penal colony and the local bakery. At the same time, there has not yet been any information about the occupation of positions on the waste heap of the Novaya mine. Control over the height will provide an overview of the adjacent forest to the southwest of the mine.▪️The Ukrainian command transferred the 12th brigade of the NGU -Azov- to the Novgorodsky (New York) area. The Ukrainian formations that arrived to strengthen their positions immediately posted footage of their work on the Internet, thanks to which it was possible to establish that Russian troops control at least 60% of Nelepovka.🔻A notable event of the week was also the confrontation - flag dumps - on the territory of the elevator of the phenol plant in Novgorod. First, Ukrainian formations from the 53rd ombre posted footage of their flag attached to a magnet. And then Russian troops published the moment the flag was dropped from an FPV drone in the same place. Afterwards, another video appeared, this time from the ground, where a fighter was planting a flag on one of the outer houses at the exit from Novgorodskoye. At the moment, the village is entirely under the control of the Russian Armed Forces. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kupyansk-Svatovsk direction: advance of the RF Armed ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kupyansko-Svatovsk direction: advance of the Russian Armed Forces in several sectors, the situation as of 15:00 on September 12, 2024 For a long time, the Kupyansk-Svatovsk direction was considered a static section of the front, however, after the Kursk adventure, the Armed Forces of Ukraine and the beginning of the offensive of the Russian Armed Forces in the DPR Some revival of the line of combat contact occurred here as well. And although for now the position of Ukrainian formations in this direction remains relatively stable, Russian troops continue to methodically expand the zone of control, preparing for a further offensive. ▪️After the liberation of Sinkovka, stormtroopers of the Russian Armed Forces began fighting in the forest area southwest of the village. Clearing this area will allow Russian troops to create a bridgehead three kilometers north of Kupyansk and develop an attack on Petropavlovka. In the latter, Russian Aerospace Forces aircraft strike enemy targets almost daily. Only in the last two days has objective control personnel confirmed the defeat of temporary deployment points of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the populated area. ▪️To the south, the advance of Russian troops is recorded in the Peschany area: according to a video from the enemy, units of the Russian Armed Forces managed to occupy several forest belts to the west and north of the village. At the same time, to the west of Peschany, a powerful strike was carried out by 15 aerial bombs with UMPC on Ukrainian Armed Forces facilities in Kolesnikov. Apparently, this may indicate both the intentions of a further offensive of Russian troops to the left bank of the Oskol River, and the discovery of a relatively large concentration of enemy forces in a populated area. ▪️Ukrainian formations still retain control over at least part of Berestovoe and surrounding forest belts. At the same time, to the south, the assault groups of the Russian Armed Forces were able to advance about a kilometer in depth to the west. 🔻The enemy is actively using drones with a device for spraying an incendiary mixture over the positions of Russian troops in forest areas. Just based on footage in recent days, similar drones were seen west of Liman Pervy, south of Berestovoy and in the Peschany area. Nevertheless, similar incendiary drones have already appeared among Russian UAV operators. Title: 🇦🇲🇪🇺 In Armenia they decided to rehabilitate the idea of ​​ho...
Description: 🇦🇲🇪🇺 In Armenia, they decided to rehabilitate the idea of ​​holding a referendum on joining the EU.▪️The authorities came up with such an initiative back in June, but public opinion received it ambiguously, after which Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan declared the referendum inappropriate. ▪️However, recently the Central Election Commission of Armenia registered an initiative to begin collecting signatures to organize a plebiscite. Within 60 days, the initiative group must collect 50 thousand signatures, after which the initiative will be submitted to parliament for consideration. ▪️Now the driving force for promoting the referendum is not the government, but a small party -Republic-.❗️It should be expected that the referendum on the European integration of Armenia will still take place to meet the electoral expectations of society. After all, back in the spring, the authorities led by Pashinyan promised to hold either a referendum on amending the Constitution or early elections, and the process of signing a peace treaty with Azerbaijan has clearly come to a standstill. ▪️It is not surprising that the return to the agenda of the referendum on European integration coincided with the start of negotiations on the liberalization of the visa regime for Armenia with the EU. 🔻Mythical European promises in the context of internal political problems and diplomatic failures are the only thing that the Pashinyan government can now offer to the population of Armenia. 📌At the same time, as practice in Moldova shows, holding a referendum on European integration is a fiction and an opportunity to feed society with false promises, because voting does not oblige European officials to anything.#Armenia #EU @rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁🎬 Storm Shadow or JASSM: which is more dangerous for us? Mikha...
Description: Forwarded From Ostashko! ImportantStorm Shadow or JASSM: which is more dangerous for us? Mikhail Zvinchuk, head of the analytical center -Rybar-▪️The West could give permission to use missiles on Russian territory in the summer of 2022 if it wanted. However, the escalation occurs gradually. At the same time, the volume of military assistance to Ukraine is not so large now, but many deliveries take place behind the scenes, and then they are legalized: for example, they transferred F-16s, and to them JASSM cruise missiles.▪️Storm Shadow missiles: our air defense systems are more than familiar with them . Perhaps for some air defense units in the Bryansk, Kursk, and Belgorod regions this will be a new experience. But at the same time, our entire air defense system is centralized. ✔️Storm Shadow will now be used because massive drone strikes did not give the desired result.▪️The complex use of missiles in the concept of NATO multi-domain operation is dangerous for us. Similar operations are being practiced in Crimea: this is a combination of satellite reconnaissance equipment, observers and spotters on the ground, the use first of drones, then of cruise missiles, then of operational-tactical missiles. Separately, we learned to cope with the same ATACMS, as last night in the Zaporozhye region: everything was shot down. The situation at the front.▪️In August, the Ukrainian Armed Forces were preparing not only for striking in the Kursk region, but also in other directions: options were calculated in the Kherson and Zaporozhye regions. Not only did they fail to implement the plan for the first 10-20 days, they were forced to withdraw reserves that were preparing for this offensive.▪️We also see that the Ukrainian Armed Forces are now throwing unprepared units into the DPR, which would have to recapture the same Ukrainsk or defend Selidovo. It seems that the Ukrainian formations are gradually surrendering to the DPR.▪️Of course, we have a huge, hard job ahead of us, but now we are actually tearing apart the front that has stood for a long time. Our troops are approaching Mirnograd and Pokrovsk. We are approaching Kurakhovo from the north, gradually tightening the ring around the group north of Krasnogorovka. The fighting near Ugledar has now intensified.▪️The rest of the front is relatively stable. In the Svatovo-Kupyansk direction there is still a positional struggle, as well as near Seversk. In the Orekhovsky and Kherson areas too. ▪️But the Armed Forces of Ukraine do not give up attempts to probe our defenses at unexpected points and try to study our tactics. Yesterday's attempt to land on gas fields in the Black Sea is not such an unsuccessful operation: Ukrainian forces and British SAS instructors and advisers, who are obsessed with conducting naval operations, are studying the tactics of Russian troops' response. And they get answers. A game is being played where the bargaining chip is Ukrainian cannon fodder.#important Video is too big

Title: 🇷🇺🇺🇦🖇 In addition to the -unsuccessful- operation of the Ukr...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦🖇 In addition to the -unsuccessful- operation of the Ukrainian Armed Forces to seize the drilling platform -Crimea-2-Yesterday’s attack by Ukrainian forces on the Golitsyn gas field only formally ended in failure for the Ukrainian Armed Forces. Yes, several lost boats and landing groups without any visible result in capturing the platform can form the impression of another suicidal attack. But this impression is false. The task of the Ukrainian Armed Forces and British curators (who are behind the preparation of every naval operation with the participation of Ukrainian special forces) was to test the Russian defense system and evaluate our response to the attack. The Ukrainian command knows that the Russian Armed Forces have reconnaissance capabilities and means that can determine the exits of the BEC. And, accordingly, they will look for them. Therefore, the next step will be to work on eliminating our intelligence complexes. The Ukrainian Armed Forces will try to strike remotely or suppress our electronic warfare systems capable of detecting their equipment. Unfortunately, during the sortie, the Ukrainian formations still managed to hit a Russian Su-30 from a MANPADS installed on board the boat. And from this point of view, such an exchange of cannon fodder for a Russian aircraft will look extremely advantageous for British curators. In general, given the fact that the British have significant human and technical resources at their disposal, with losses in the course of constant attempts to scout out weak points in the Russian defense, no one will be taken into account. Description: Forwarded From Two Majors⚡️The West will involve Ukraine in the ⚡️Transnistrian direction. The head of the Odessa Regional Military Administration, Oleg Kiper, opened up during an interview and released data on the construction by the State Service of Special Communications and Information Protection of Ukraine (Gosspetsvyaz) of 13 television and radio broadcasting towers along the entire length of the border with the PMR. The reason for the installation was formally the fight against signal reception of Russian channels from Crimea (❗️) and 🇷🇴Romanian broadcasts in the Odessa region. In fact, an increase in information impact on the residents of Transnistria through anti-Russian TV channels and radio is expected. Before the Northeast Military District, Ukraine, within the framework of the Strategy for Information Reintegration of the Autonomous Republic of Crimea and the city of Sevastopol, in the Kherson region also deployed infrastructure for disseminating its propaganda to Crimea. In total, they managed to install 5 towers in border settlements (Vasilievka, Novotroitskoye, Chongar, Chaplinka and Genichesk), transmitting 20 TV channels and 7 radio stations. The active participation in this process of the United States Agency for International Cooperation (USAID), which donated 3 sets of equipment for towers in the Kherson region, is indicative.✨Interest in increasing information capabilities to influence Transnistria is associated primarily with the upcoming presidential elections in Moldova on October 20, as well as referendum on joining the EU. The West is using all available resources to oust Russia from the region and create a split in society in order to use this to implement scenarios beneficial to itself. Two majors

Title: 🖼 🇱🇾 About the economic crisis in Libya Another escalation in ...
Description: 🇱🇾 About the economic crisis in Libya Another escalation in Libya associated with the advance of the troops of the Libyan National Army, controlled by the eastern government, is accompanied by another crisis.▪️So, for several weeks now there have been disputes about who should manage the Central Bank of Libya. It is through him that they are passing all the money comes from oil revenues, so he is an important link in the political struggle between factions. It all started when, at the end of August, armed people broke into the Central Bank building in Tripoli and installed their deputy chairman. Of course, this news was picked up by all news agencies and began to spread panic among the Libyans and the West.❗️The most interesting thing about this is that the Central Bank building is just a screen, and real power is in the hands of those who have access to the electronic system. Its management is in the hands of the Turkish protege Siddiq al-Kabir.▪️But the trick was a success - the chairman of the Central Bank left the country, and the Americans announced the suspension of financial transactions between the countries. And oil exports from western Libya were suspended due to increased risks and confusion. And at the moment it is extremely limited.🔻Probably this incident was organized at the instigation of the eastern government in order to take over the Central Bank. Actually, control over it means for Haftar supremacy in Libya, because oil revenues are the main one for the country. And the recent strengthening of the Libyan National Army in different parts of the country only emphasizes the ambitions of the leadership in Benghazi to strengthen its position in the country. Title: 🖼 🇮🇳🇨🇳🇺🇸 The faster the temperature rises in China's relat...
Description: 🇮🇳🇨🇳🇺🇸 The faster the temperature in China’s relations with the United States and allies grows, the more often we see Indian units interacting with American troops in joint exercises. Only recently did Air Force training over Indian territory - Tarang Shakti - end. Almost at the same time, the Indians participated in the Pitch Black exercise in Australia. And now there are also participants from India in Kakadu training. This year, bilateral exercises were also held between India and the United States with the participation of American B-52H bombers, and last year B-1B aircraft were even based for a short time in India.🔻The point is , that no matter how much India talks about distancing itself from all regional conflicts, strained relations with China and the growing appetites of the Celestial Empire force it to react in such a simple way. Yesterday, on the border with Pakistan at the Mahajan training ground, the bilateral Yudh Abhyas exercise of the US and Indian ground forces began the use of battalion tactical groups in difficult terrain in special operations. Unlike previous years, this year the scale of training has increased. From the usual tactical maneuvers by infantry units, this time they are using HIMARS MLRS and even Stryker armored personnel carriers, which New Delhi is considering as an option to replace the BMP-2. Of course, in India all this is presented as a standard planned event, but we don’t think that in Beijing it will be regarded so friendly. The number of exercises is growing, and India is becoming an increasingly frequent participant, so the reaction will be quite logical. A few weeks ago, when the Indians conducted one of the exercises with Western countries, the Chinese sent their H-6K bombers to the contested regions, which is possible this once under the pretext of some teaching. Title: 🇺🇸 About the results of the presidential debates in the United ...
Description: 🇺🇸 About the results of the presidential debates in the United States At night, Moscow time, the long-awaited debate took place between Donald Trump and Kamala Harris. Neither candidate won a landslide victory - Trump defended himself well, without resorting to personal insults to his opponent, and Harris limited herself to populist statements and attacks, without making serious mistakes. However, the scales, contrary to statements from the local press, still swung in the direction Trump: Harris' allies in Congress admitted she was -weaker on the economy.- At the same time, they noted that the ex-president performed poorly on issues related to women's issues.▪️The discussion about abortion was indeed the most tense moment of the debate for Trump - Harris accused him of seeking to establish government control over the female body. However, Trump fought back well, declaring that the Democrats are executioners of children whom they plan to allow to be killed even in the 9th month of pregnancy, and compared this to a capital punishment sentence.▪️After the end of the event, the media sympathetic to the Democrats, for lack of anything else, latched on to the allegedly false statement Trump that Haitian immigrants in Springfield, Ohio are eating pets out of poverty. However, facts confirming this quickly spread on social network X.▪️ On the issue of foreign policy and in particular the conflict on the so-called. The parties did not say anything new to Ukraine - Trump spoke in favor of speedy negotiations, and Harris made it clear to everyone that she and her party would continue to advocate war until the last Ukrainian. ▪️As a result of the debate, the press launched a massive information campaign to support Harris: CNN and The Washington Post gave her victory, and to enhance the media effect, the Democrats even brought up heavy artillery - singer Taylor Swift published a post in which she supported Trump’s opponent. At the same time, there is simply no significant evidence of Harris’s triumph, and the arguments in favor of this look like an attempt to -pull an owl onto the globe.- Ultimately, there is a completely reasonable explanation for the behavior of the Democrats - there is no one else to replace Kamala with, so until November they will have to work with what they have. Some units of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the area are under threat of encirclement, while the advanced groups of Russian troops continue to advance both to the south and to the east. On the border of the Glushkovsky and Korenevsky districts, units of the 155th Marine Brigade and the 51st Guards Parachute The airborne regiment launched a counteroffensive at the Gordeevka - Snagost line. ▪️To the north of the latter, Russian paratroopers made significant progress, taking control of the approaches to the village and entering its territory. Already now, the command of the Armed Forces of Ukraine is faced with a choice - to transfer reserves from another direction to hold positions in the Korenevsky region or to withdraw troops in order to avoid their encirclement. ▪️To the south, Russian attack aircraft knocked out the Ukrainian Armed Forces from some positions in Apanasovka and its environs. Our sources do not confirm the complete liberation of the settlement, however, in light of successes in other areas, the position of the Ukrainian formations defending there may become significantly more complicated in the near future. ▪️In the area of ​​the tract, on October 10, units of the Russian Armed Forces carried out a successful attack, knocking out the Ukrainian Armed Forces from several positions in the area of ​​the settlement. Ukrainian formations launched several attacks in the area of ​​Cherkasy Konopelka, Kamyshevka, Maryevka and Borok, but were not successful. Title: 🇰🇷🇯🇵 On the future of relations between Japan and South Korea...
Description: 🇰🇷🇯🇵 On the future of relations between Japan and South Korea Last week, Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida held his 12th meeting with South Korean President Yoon Seok Yeol. Negotiations between the leaders were probably the last - the fact is that at the end of September in Japan there will be elections for the leader of the ruling Liberal Democratic Party, in which Kishida is not taking part. At the meeting, grandiloquent statements were made about the importance of further development of relations between Tokyo and Seoul. Let us recall that the rapprochement of the countries began under pressure from Washington in March 2023 and not without enthusiasm on the part of the South Korean leader. The future of bilateral ties now remains unknown due to the elections in Japan. However, most likely, the change in the Japanese leader will not lead to a setback in relations. The development of ties with Seoul fits the main foreign policy priorities of the United States and Japan, which includes developing a response to the North Korean threat. Of course, if the post of Japanese Prime Minister is taken by a more conservative politician, relations between Tokyo and Seoul may be shaken. However, given the South Korean president's flexibility when it comes to Japan's past, the two sides are likely to find an option to further develop ties. Moreover, for Yun, the restoration of relations with Tokyo is almost the most important foreign policy achievement, which his administration will not simply abandon. #Republic of Korea #Japan@rybar with @awaken_dragonSupport us ReutersJapan PM Kishida seeks to solidify South Korea ties on farewell visitJapanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida arrived for a whirlwind visit to South Korea on Friday, seeking to seal a newfound partnership between the neighbors which will be tested by imminent changes of leaders in Tokyo and Washington.

If placed further north, the radius may also include the territory of the Russian Far East. Secondly, will Typhon be removed from Philippine territory. Yes, the system is due to go home after the completion of the Salaknib exercise evaluation in September. However, back in the summer, the Philippine authorities gave themselves some room to maneuver, mentioning that Typhon could remain in the future if necessary. Moreover, recently there have been some hints that the withdrawal of the missile system will depend on China’s behavior in the South China Sea. Given the situation in the region, the scenario of further deployment of Typhon in the Philippines is very likely. Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Raid of Ukrainian UAVs on Russian regions what is known by 12:00 September 10, 2024 Last night, Ukrainian formations carried out a massive attack on Russian regions. Air defense forces intercepted 144 enemy drones in eight regions of the country, and there were no casualties. ▪️The largest number of targets were destroyed in the airspace of the Bryansk region - air defense forces shot down 72 drones. According to available data, no destruction or casualties have been recorded in the region. ▪️In the Moscow region, UAF drones damaged two residential buildings in Ramenskoye. As a result of the explosion on Sportivny Proezd, a civilian was killed and three other people were injured. In the first entrance of the building, destruction was recorded in 54 apartments out of 102, while no damage to load-bearing structures was detected. The second strike hit a house on Vysokovoltnaya Street, where the UAV damaged several balconies on the ninth floor. Some of the drone debris fell near the building, emergency services carried out demining. More than 40 city residents are now staying in temporary accommodation centers, and they are being provided with all the necessary assistance. ❗️Local authorities are assessing the damage received and, according to the regional governor, have pledged to help restore all facilities damaged during the raid. ▪️13 enemy UAVs were intercepted in the airspace of the Tula region, some of the debris fell on the territory of one of the local fuel and energy facilities. According to information from local authorities, the enterprise did not suffer serious damage and the technological process was not disrupted. No casualties were reported in the region as a result of the raid. ▪️UAVs were also intercepted over the territories of Kursk, Belgorod, Voronezh, Lipetsk, Kaluga and Oryol regions. Temporary flight restrictions were introduced at Domodedovo, Vnukovo, Zhukovsky and Kazan airports. According to available data, damage and casualties were avoided in the listed regions. Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇸🇾 Large air raid by the Israeli Air Force on western Sy...
Description: 🇮🇱🇸🇾 Large air raid by the Israeli Air Force on western Syria Last night, the Israeli Air Force launched another strike on the territory of the Syrian Arab Republic. The latest attack was one of the largest in recent times: about 15 strikes were carried out across several provinces at once. The Syrian Ministry of Defense reported that the missile launches were carried out from the airspace over the northern part of Lebanon and from the Mediterranean Sea. And although some of the ammunition was destroyed by air defense systems, others managed to hit government targets. ▪️In the province of Hama, the target was the city of Masyaf and the Scientific Research Center located southwest. The facility is used to produce components for high-precision surface-to-surface missiles. Like other Syrian scientific institutes, the center's staff actively interacts with Lebanese Hezbollah and Iranian scientists. Masyaf and its surroundings have previously been subject to attacks by the Israelis: according to them, positions of pro-Iranian forces are located in this area, which is not without reason. In addition to the damaged research institute, strikes were also carried out on weapons depots in Wadi al-Ayoun and Salamiyah. According to preliminary information, at least 60 people became victims of Israeli strikes in the province of Hama, 16 of whom died.▪️A convoy of military equipment was attacked in Tartus. According to some reports, armed Shiite formations are stationed in this area, fighting on the side of the Syrian army. ▪️Messages about strikes on Damascus are also spreading on the Internet, but there is no confirmation of this. It is likely that the explosions were mistaken for the work of Syrian air defense crews. Earlier last summer, the IDF Air Force attacked the positions of the Syrian armed forces several times, including destroying air defense systems. At the moment, the Syrians are armed with short-range Pantsir-S1 air defense missile systems, which allows Israeli aircraft to carry out strikes deep in Syrian territory. Title: 🇰🇿🇬🇧✈️ Where Kazakhstan is flying A record...
Description: 🇰🇿🇬🇧✈️ Where Kazakhstan is flying In Kazakhstan, a record number of aircraft were imported in six months - 13 aircraft with a capacity of 50 to 300 people. At the same time, a record number of aircraft were also taken out of the Republic of Kazakhstan - 10, of which seven flew to Ireland.▪️Thanks to its geography, Kazakhstan after Russia banned flights airlines from unfriendly countries began to claim the title of logistics hub. The desire for this is shown by the numbers of flights served by Kazaeronavigation: more than 415 thousand flights, of which about 107 thousand were on Kazakh and 308 thousand on foreign airlines, which was a record for Kazakhstan. ▪️Astana is definitely striving to expand its flight geography. In addition to the fact that Air Astana and Japan Airlines have signed a codeshare agreement (agreement on joint operation of one route), according to which they will share a new flight from Almaty to Tokyo, the launch of the Astana - New York flight is planned for the end of 2025 . ▪️It is for this reason that specialists from the US Federal Civil Aviation Administration began checking the country’s readiness to open direct flights between Kazakhstan and the States, and Kazakhstan was the first Central Asian country to open a permanent representative office in the International Civil Aviation Association (ICAO).📌An interesting touch: until February 2024, 49% of Air Astana shares belonged to the British BAE Systems, and the chief executive officer of the carrier is a British citizen, Commander of the Order of the British Empire, Peter Foster. However, recently a scandal around the airline has been gaining momentum: more and more details of flight cancellations and scandals with passengers are appearing in the press, and even hail at the Astana airport manages to damage exclusively the planes of this carrier, photos of which are immediately leaked to bloggers. 🔻Added to this was the radical statement by the Chairman of the Civil Aviation Committee of Kazakhstan that Air Astana does not and did not have official status as a national carrier. At the same time, Air Astana has always positioned itself as a nationalist and even used this term in its marketing materials. ❗️While -purely British- and other Western airlines are refusing flights to China due to the need to fly over Russia and rising costs, London has resolved the logistics issue through a -partner-. But the statement of the KGA may indicate that the authorities of the Republic of Kazakhstan are planning to review aviation policy from the position of newly acquired strength. And create or declare 100% of the national carrier, while depriving the joint company with the UK of the opportunity to skim all the cream.#Kazakhstan #CentralAsia@rybar Support usKazakhstanskaya PravdaA record number of passenger aircraft was imported by Kazakhstan in six months. Title: 🖼 🇨🇩 About the attempt to escape from prison in Kinshasa Again...
Description: 🇨🇩 About an attempt to escape from prison in Kinshasa Against the background of other events, an interesting incident that occurred in the capital of the Democratic Republic of Congo on September 2 went unnoticed. Several hundred inmates of the Makala prison tried to escape from prison, without even a bladed weapon. The riot began in the courtroom and the judges came under attack from the prisoners. After which the protesters managed to set fire to the courtroom and a warehouse-hangar not far from it, after which they went to the women's pavilion, where they raped hundreds of women. Then they locked themselves in pavilion 11, since at that time they were already surrounded by security forces. As a result of the riot, more than a hundred prisoners died and 59 were injured. The main cause of death was stampede, and only 24 people died due to police fire.❗️The fact that prisoners were ready to escape at any cost even without a clear plan or weapons speaks about the harsh conditions in prisons. Thus, the Makala colony was not modernized with colonial times, and houses approximately 14,400 people, nearly 10 times its designed capacity. In addition, the majority are kept there only awaiting their sentence. Such people have nothing to lose. Against the background of these events, it is worth paying attention to a similar situation among our allies. The prison in Niamey, the capital of Niger, houses four times as many people as estimated. And in such conditions, terrorist ideas also spread well, which has already resulted in the recent uprising. But it’s worth limiting yourself not only to Africa. The problem of overcrowding in penitentiary institutions is also present in some Russian regions, although it is clearly being solved more effectively (let alone the Storm-Z squads) than on the Dark Continent. High-resolution infographicsEnglish version#Africa #DRC@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇱🇾🇹🇷 The Libyan front, apparently, is expecting a noticeable ...
Description: 🇱🇾🇹🇷 The Libyan front, apparently, will see a noticeable revival in the near future. The head of Turkish intelligence, Ibrahim Kalin, visited Libya on September 5, where he held meetings with the leaders of the Turkish-backed Government of National Unity (GNU). After the approval of the memorandum of understanding between Turkey and the GNU, the powers of the Turkish contingent in Libya were seriously expanded, so the head’s visit intelligence seems a logical consequence.📌 There are no details about what exactly was discussed during these meetings. It is extremely doubtful that the Turks will escalate in Libya, given their employment in Syria and Iraq. Title: 🔁 #Review #Summary for September 7, 2024 ▪️ A month and one day ...
Description: Forwarded From Two majors#Review #Summary for September 7, 2024▪️ A month and one day The Russian Army has been repelling the armed invasion of the regular Ukrainian Armed Forces in the Kursk region. Initial assessments of the scale of the invasion by respected departments quickly turned out to be not fully objective; personnel decisions are being made, so far - not at the level that many expected against the backdrop of the unpreparedness of the second echelons of defense and in connection with the ongoing arrests of high-ranking - old - employees of the Ministry of Defense. For now, the showdown is going on in the administrative and economic sector. The enemy in the Kursk region is constrained in battle, but does not give up attempts to push through our defenses, pulling reserves into the region. In the Russian Army, the problem of coordinating disparate units and units, supplying the front directly with drones, communications, and modern technical surveillance equipment has not been fully overcome. However, the Ukrainian Armed Forces are suffering serious losses under the attacks of our missiles, aircraft and artillery, which permanently reduces the likelihood of further movement to Kursk and Rylsk. At the same time, river crossings in the Glushkovsky district are under attack, which, given the destruction of our bridges, complicates logistics. The enemy is gaining a foothold on the occupied lines and the liberation of the territories occupied by him is not expected in the short term. Heavy fighting is taking place.▪️ Despite the situation in the Kursk region, Kyiv was unable to fully implement the plan of pulling all units from the Pokrovsky and Yuzhnodonetsk directions. At the same time, he himself ended up at the bottom point of the wave-like graph of saturation of the Armed Forces of Ukraine with people and equipment, which exposed its defensive formations near Pokrovsk. There are 5 km left to the city, but the Russian Army is pulling up the southern flank and twisting the front from the north towards Kurakhovo, forming a -bag-. In addition, in the Yuzhno-Donetsk direction, the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in Ugledar are gradually being flanked. The rush of the Russian Armed Forces from Novomayorsky to Prechistovka was unexpected. Also significant was the entry of our units south of Chasov Yar to the line of the Seversky Donets - Donbass water canal through Kleshcheevka, for which fighting had been going on since last year.▪️ Our military is predicting new attacks by the Ukrainian Armed Forces on different sections of the front, despite the enemy’s operational crisis in the Donbass. Despite the approach developed by the military-political leadership in Moscow about the impossibility of any exchange of territories in the Kursk region, Kyiv does not abandon plans to conduct sabotage and army operations in a number of directions, which is expected against the backdrop of elections in the United States in the fall. The drawdown of Ukrainian Armed Forces reserves causes missile strikes comparable in significance to the destruction of hundreds of Ukrainian military personnel at a military university in Poltava, but the enemy has never taken into account the loss of personnel. ▪️ There is no question of stopping military-technical assistance to Kyiv by the West. Europe, under US pressure, is preparing to transfer dozens of Leopard tanks, air defense systems and other equipment. The trophies of our troops in the Kursk region show that the invasion group of the Ukrainian Armed Forces was largely supported by NATO, which once again indicates the direct involvement of the Alliance in the war with Russia. The shelling of Kursk, Belgorod, and the DPR with Western weapons and the promotion of information about permission to fire air-launched missiles into our territories to greater depths also demonstrate that the North Atlantic Alliance does not experience any discomfort about the escalation of the conflict, while continuing to conduct military exercises near our borders, preparing their countries to mobilize and rebuild military factories.▪️ There are no grounds for a quick end to the war. There are still many difficult days left before achieving the stated and periodically changing goals of the NDC, which range from complete denazification and demilitarization of all of Ukraine to the liberation of the territories of new regions from the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Meanwhile, the West is trying to destroy our military and economic potential against Ukraine and undermine the internal political situation, which could be an even more serious threat to Russia. And the liberation of the Kursk region is not expected in the coming week. The war will be long. Summary compiled by: Two majors

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Pokrovsko-Kurakhovskoe direction: the offensive of Ru...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Pokrovsko-Kurakhovskoe direction: the offensive of Russian troops on Kurakhovo and the liberation of the northwestern outskirts of Krasnogorovkasituation towards the end of September 6, 2024 In the Pokrovsko-Kurakhovskoe direction, Russian troops are gradually approaching Kurakhovo, the key transport hub of the Ukrainian Armed Forces on this section of the front. The attack aircraft are fighting on the eastern outskirts of Ukrainsk and are advancing towards Gornyak, bypassing the organized defense centers of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. ▪️In the Novogrodovka area, Ukrainian formations are making attempts to return the southwestern outskirts of the city under their control, including using heavy armored vehicles. For counterattacks, units of the 57th brigade, partly consisting of former completed ones, are used. ▪️In Selidovo, the fighting moved into the positional phase, the Ukrainian Armed Forces managed to transfer a sufficient number of troops to the populated area to organize a sustainable defense. Russian units are fighting in the area of ​​Gogol and 8th September streets, while no significant changes in the battle line have been noted. A few days ago, information appeared in the chats of local residents about the advance of attack aircraft of the Russian Armed Forces towards the central city hospital. It is likely that Russian intelligence officers were actually able to get close to the territory of the medical facility, but then retreated. At the moment, the situation in this area of ​​the city remains hidden by the fog of war. ▪️Russian troops have managed to completely occupy Lesovka over the past few days. Information about the liberation of Dolinovka, where the Russian flag was hoisted, was also confirmed. Then, relying on the occupied positions, the Russian Armed Forces launched an attack on Ukrainsk, trying to bypass the enemy’s defensive lines from the south and cut off the remaining Ukrainian Armed Forces units in the city from supplies. Russian attack aircraft knocked the enemy out of Karl Marx Street and gained a foothold on it, creating a springboard for the further liberation of the village. ❗️Some sources report the beginning of the assault by Russian troops on Gornyak, the last settlement before Kurakhovka. However, it is not possible to confirm this information with objective monitoring footage, while the testimony of local residents is quite often confused and inaccurate. ▪️To the east, Russian troops launched a series of attacks in the direction of Zhelanny First from Galitsynivka along Ivan Sereda Street, but their results remain unknown. Later, footage of a Ukrainian landing on the southern outskirts of the village, where fighting continues, appeared on the Internet.▪️The long information lull that prevailed in the Krasnogorovsky area was finally broken. Footage has appeared on the Internet showing the Russian flag on the building of the House of Culture in the private sector on the north-western outskirts of the settlement - it was there that units of the Ukrainian Armed Forces held positions for a long time, but their position significantly worsened due to the successes of the Russian Armed Forces in neighboring areas. At the same time, it is also reported that the presence of the enemy remains in this area, which is blocked in individual buildings and basements. Now Russian troops are clearing out the private sector and eliminating pockets of resistance to the Ukrainian Armed Forces. Also, Ukrainian formations retain the ability to hold defenses in a complex of farms to the west of the private sector. Just look at the Magnificent Century, which tells the story of Suleiman I the Magnificent, under whom the Ottoman Empire reached the pinnacle of its power. The series found special love among Turkic and Muslim audiences, reminding them of former greatness (even if historically they had nothing to do with it). ❗️The attractive image of Turkey and its historical heritage created in this way is also projected onto future geopolitical projects. 🔻The accumulated colossal experience and influence of Turkish cinema should not be underestimated. Today, TV series produced in Turkey are broadcast in more than 170 countries around the world, reaching an audience of about 750 million people. These include Russians, who are massively hooked on them. Next year's budget will almost certainly be the largest in history - Japan will break its own records for the 11th time in a row. ▪️The funds will go to all the same areas that Tokyo has been focusing its attention on lately. These include, for example, the development of air defense and missile defense, unmanned aerial vehicles, and long-range missiles. ▪️Despite the development of high military technologies, one of the main problems of the Japanese Self-Defense Forces remains saturation with personnel. We previously wrote that the country once again did not recruit the required number of people to serve in the army. By the way, in February 2023, a commission to solve this problem stated that the authorities need to focus on increasing the salaries of military personnel and improving their living conditions and labor. However, spending on personnel continues to decline - in the budget for this year they account for 29%, and in spending for the next only 27%. 🔻Obviously, in Japanese military circles they are betting on the development of high technologies and asymmetric means of defense of the country. Given the changing security situation in the Asia-Pacific region, time will tell whether this approach will be justified. #Japan@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usNaval NewsJapan requests largest-ever defense budget for fiscal year 2025The Japan MoD issued its largest ever defense budget request. Description: 🇦🇿🇰🇿 Why does Azerbaijan share combat experience with Kazakhstan? At the Koktal training ground in Kazakhstan, from August 20 to 23, joint tactical and special exercises were held - Altyn Kyran - 2024 - (Golden Eagle - 2024), in which about 300 took part military personnel of both countries. The purpose of the exercise was to develop combat potential during reconnaissance operations. The Ministry of Defense of the Republic of Azerbaijan reports that during the exercise, the units, having traveled along a selected traverse of 25 km, discovered and raided the shelters of illegal armed groups hiding in the mountainous area. The tasks of ambushing convoys and destroying the manpower of illegal armed groups, as well as other tasks that suddenly arose, were also successfully completed.📌This is not the first exercise of Azerbaijan and Kazakhstan. In July of this year, military personnel of both countries took part in the international operational-tactical command and staff exercise Birlestik-2024 (Alliance-2024) with the participation of Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan and Uzbekistan in the Mangistau region of Kazakhstan. We have already written that the Kazakh army after the events January 2022 is being actively updated, focusing on mobility. The Azerbaijani army has managed to gain unique experience through the use of drones and conducting combat operations with limited forces, in a hostile environment and difficult natural conditions. Modern war largely blurs the boundaries between a full-fledged war and a counter-terrorist operation, so Kazakhstan’s interest here is understandable. The question is against whom the acquired skills will be used. Well, another goal of the event, as well as the Birlestik-2024 exercises, which is not obvious at first glance, is the militarization of the Organization of Turkic States in the interests of Ankara, where they are actively lobbying for the promotion of their weapons and creation of a supranational military Alliance in the region.#Kazakhstan  #Azerbaijan #CentralAsia@rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇦🇿🇰🇿🇰🇬🇺🇿 About the exercise -Alliance-2024-Meanwhile, the day before yesterday, the multinational exercise -Birlestik-2024-, which can also be called -Alliance-, started in Kazakhstan. Five countries take part in it: Azerbaijan, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan and Uzbekistan.…

Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇸 Indeed, in some places sanctions have led to positive processes of internal development. Previously, domestic products were often under pressure from Western competitors, but with their departure, Russian companies received orders, which has a positive effect on industrial performance. However, in the same aircraft and engine manufacturing, transport sector and other areas, Russia may well regain some of the previously lost positions or even take new ones. However, it is important not to forget that this can only be achieved through targeted work with comprehensive planning and implementation of various forms of state support. Nothing will appear by itself, and simply replacing Western products with Chinese ones will not add growth to our own industry. Well, in general, it is necessary to avoid perceiving the current economic situation in Russia as a given, and not the fruit of the colossal work of people to create the same schemes for circumventing sanctions or - shadow fleet-. At a minimum, this will allow us not to stand still and reject populist proposals.#Russia #USA #economy@rybarSupport usTelegramOlder than EddaLooking at Western sanctions against us, I actually want to wish them to last as long as possible. Title: 🇨🇳🇺🇸🇵🇭 On the revision of the defense treaty between the Ph...
Description: 🇨🇳🇺🇸🇵🇭 On the revision of the defense treaty between the Philippines and the United States Against the backdrop of recent regular skirmishes in the South China Sea between the Chinese and the Philippines, a discussion on the revision of the mutual defense treaty between the United States and the Philippines is increasingly developing in Manila. A representative of the National Maritime Council recently said that since the signing of the document, the situation in the region has changed significantly, and it is time to update the agreement. The Secretary of Defense also calls for this, focusing on expanding the interpretation of the provisions on an attack on the Philippines, in the event of which the United States must stand up for the island state. 🔻The concerns of the Philippine authorities are understandable: vague language, such as the lack of a specific definition of an armed attack, allows for different interpretations of the treaty. In the current video, the document cannot fully restrain China's ambitions in the South China Sea. And although it is not clear whether the Americans will agree to a revision, certain trends are visible here. For example, the 2023 Indo-Pacific Command report interprets armed attack extremely broadly. The wording actually includes the use of water cannons - the Chinese’s favorite means of pushing the Filipinos out to sea. The issue of revision is directly related to the US-China confrontation, and if the stakes increase, significant amendments may be made to the agreement. However, judging by the rhetoric of the Americans and the Chinese, there is no talk of escalation yet: this may mean that revising the agreement will remain only a dream of the Philippine authorities for now. #China #USA #Philippines@rybar with @awaken_dragonSupport usPhilippine News AgencyReview of PH-US defense treaty amid 'new security challenges'MANILA – The National Maritime Council (NMC) believes it is about time the Philippines and the United States (US ) review their over seven-decades-old Mutual Defense Treaty (MDT) to make it more responsive to the modern security landscape. Title: 🔁🖼 In the interests of the West, Ukraine continues to develop t...
Description: Forwarded From Two MajorsIn the interests of the West in Ukraine  continue to develop the sphere of railway transportation on the section Chop - Uzhgorod  (near the borders with 🇭🇺Hungary and 🇸🇰Slovakia) work began on preparing the ground for laying Eurogauge (1435 mm). By July 2025, 22 km of railway track will be built, reconstruction of artificial structures, facilities and utility networks, and a European signaling system will be carried out. The 🇪🇺EU Connecting Europe Facility (CEF) Fund paid 50% (15.7 million euros) of the cost of the entire project. Investments go towards development  logistics hubs on routes with the EU. On the territory of the Vinnitsa urban community, construction is underway of a dry port - a railway terminal connecting the central regions of Ukraine with the ports of Odessa and through the container terminal - Mostyksky - (Lviv region, owned by the oligarch Akhmetov) with EU countries. At the first stage (autumn 2024), railway infrastructure and the first container site with a throughput capacity of about 30 thousand TEU per year will be built. Investments in the project amounted to $15 million. The logistics hub itself  -Mostyksky - will be complemented by a new container platform with a transition gauge of 1520 mm - 1435 mm, as well as a portal container crane on rails RMG. Earlier, in June 2023, pumping stations were already installed at Mostyksky, allowing for the transshipment of large volumes of liquid cargo from cars to railway tanks and from railway tanks from 1520 mm tracks to tanks on 1435 mm tracks. European Bank for Reconstruction and Development&nbsp ; (EBRD) in August announced an international tender for the purchase of 10 battery-powered shunting locomotives for Ukrzaliznytsia (UZ). In June 2024, as part of the program to update the locomotive fleet, the EBRD announced a loan of 300 million euros to UZ for the purchase of electric freight locomotives. At the beginning of 2024, the World Bank allocated $190 million to UZ for the acquisition  80 electric freight locomotives. These purchases made it possible to identify Ukraine’s needs for dual-system electric locomotives (DC/AC), including 25 kV, with a maximum operating speed of up to 120 km/h. The lack of trained personnel is also an acute issue, especially against the backdrop of the fierce mobilization of the male population. In addition, the US Agency for International Development (USAID) provided 300 grain wagons to Ukrainian exporters. It is significant that Ukraine is actively using grain carriers and agricultural facilities  for the transportation and storage of military equipment supplied by Western countries through grain export channels (-alternative grain corridor-, -solidarity routes-). USAID is also preparing a feasibility study for the construction of the Bereshty multimodal logistics complex in 🇲🇩Moldova, which is designed to move cargo to Ukraine.✨Western investments in railway infrastructure are colossal and are associated primarily with commercial interests in the export of Ukrainian agricultural products and other resources. At the same time, NATO countries plan to use these routes to transfer their military cargo, equipment and personnel to the Russian direction.-Drang nach Osten 2.0-Two majors

Title: 🇦🇿🗳 About the results of the parliamentary elections in Azerba...
Description: 🇦🇿🗳 About the results of the parliamentary elections in Azerbaijan While the Central Election Commission of Azerbaijan is counting the final results (it has a maximum of 20 days for this) and transfers them to the Constitutional Court for final verification and approval (for this it has a maximum of 10 more days), the main political results can be summed up voting took place on Sunday.▪️Firstly, a decrease in voter turnout in parliamentary elections is becoming a trend. At the same time, three-quarters of voters or more come to the presidential elections. In this way, it is emphasized that Azerbaijan is not an oil sultanate, but a democratic state, and, secondly, its place in relation to the President is clearly indicated to the legislative branch.▪️ Regarding the new composition of the parliament, one can clearly say - all the same in the arena - with the clarification that they have appeared some new figures, such as the famous Soviet actor and experienced Azerbaijani ambassador to Moscow Polad Bulbul oglu, who was elected from Karabakh. Saghiba Gafarova will most likely remain at the head of the parliament and continue her international activities, essentially being the second Minister of Foreign Affairs of Azerbaijan (a minister with a female face).▪️In the new parliament there will be 10 instead of 8 opposition parties, with most of them as and in 2020 it will be represented only by the party leader. That is, the formal opposition will be 13 instead of 10 deputies. The ruling party - New Azerbaijan - will have 68 seats instead of 70.▪️According to the Central Election Commission, about 50,000 people could vote in Karabakh (in February, just over 20,000). The basis of the electorate in Karabakh were specially brought there - refugees from the occupied territories - and - forced migrants -.▪️Predictably, the elections were not recognized by the opposition and were characterized by skepticism by the West. But both of them look somehow toothless. The opposition National Council of Azerbaijan, in particular, considers the elections illegitimate, since the authorities did not allow the PACE delegation to conduct an observation mission at the elections and banned 76 members of the assembly from entering Azerbaijan. And the OSCE/ODIHR notes in its preliminary statement that the elections took place in a restrictive political and legal environment that does not contribute to genuine pluralism, and led to a fight devoid of competition. At the same time, all international organizations friendly to Azerbaijan, such as the CIS, SCO, Organization Turkic states, the Non-Aligned Movement (which has been living on Azerbaijan's money in recent years), the Parliamentary Assembly of the Black Sea Economic Cooperation and other elections were recognized as almost flawless. 🔻To summarize, we can say that the Azerbaijani authorities successfully held the first parliamentary elections throughout the country, received deputies in the parliament who will now legally represent the interests not of refugees from Karabakh as before, but of the population of Karabakh (even if brought), that is a significant trump card in the negotiation process. #Azerbaijan #elections@rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇦🇿🗳 Today, early elections to the National Assembly are being held in Azerbaijan. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: attacks on the rear of Ukrainian tro...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: attacks on the rear of Ukrainian troops and battles in the Korenevsky region situation as of 20:00 on September 4, 2024 A relatively stable situation remains in the Kursk direction: in recent days, mainly positional clashes have been recorded along the line of contact. Against this background, the Armed Forces of Ukraine began to more often transfer personnel and equipment to the borderlands of the Sumy region, which with enviable consistency become targets of Russian missile forces. In the front-line zone, UAV operators hit pickup trucks and other lightly armored enemy vehicles.🔻No significant changes in the combat situation have been recorded in the Glushkovsky district. Russian troops continue to use pontoon crossings to evacuate civilians and supply the Russian Armed Forces group. 🔻In the Korenevsky district, attacks are being carried out on the equipment of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, which is trying to break through to the approaches to Korenevo - the settlement itself is under the stable control of the Russian Armed Forces. Russian UAV operators hit all visible targets. Clashes continue in Olgovka, which changes hands. The enemy's attempts to gain a foothold in Komarovka were repelled. In the Sudzhansky district, clashes continue in the Malaya Loknya area, and operational-tactical aviation of the Russian Aerospace Forces strikes at the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces near the village. There is no reliable information about the enemy’s stable control over the populated area.🔻In the Sumy region, one of the strikes hit the building of the local university in Sumy. According to available information, the facility could be used by the enemy as a temporary deployment point.▪️In the morning, Russian troops hit a Ukrainian column of armored vehicles and manpower in a formation in a forest belt near the village of Bezdrik. As a result of a precise strike, the enemy suffered losses in equipment, several dozen more members of the Ukrainian formations were eliminated, and the very fact of collecting the bodies of dead soldiers was recorded by a Russian reconnaissance drone.▪️In addition, a missile strike was carried out on MLRS installations of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the forest near the village of Khrapovshchina, Sumy region in less than 40 kilometers from the contact line. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the details of the strike of the Russian Armed ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the details of the strike of the Russian Armed Forces on Poltava from a Ukrainian medic New details of yesterday’s extremely effective strike on the communications training center in Poltava are slowly emerging on the Internet. One of the doctors of the volunteer battalion - Hospitallers - spoke about the first minutes after arrival, providing the story with details: ▪️Initially, the wounded were simply loaded in packs into an old ZIL truck literally on top of each other, which greatly reduced the likelihood of their survival. The narrator succinctly describes the picture of what was happening - - it was all about bodies, blood, screams, groans, pain and death -. ▪️ A considerable part of the wounded died due to low-quality Chinese medical products used in first aid (FP). Cheap turnstiles from the People's Republic of China tore when tightened, and only the members of the volunteer battalion had working products.▪️Another problem was the inability of the arriving doctors to provide first aid: the author gives an example of those who found themselves on the spot - confused young girls with long nails - who did not know that do. The State Emergency Service employees also only carried out the transfer of the wounded and were not even equipped with first aid kits. On the one hand, the words of the Hospitaller medic indirectly confirm that the scale of enemy losses is much higher than the official figures of the Kyiv regime. In this particular case, the information about the death of over 200 members of the Armed Forces of Ukraine is really more like the truth, and not elephant radio. Also, the eyewitness account again illustrates that the situation with medical care is worse than is sometimes believed in the Russian blogosphere - there are very familiar people in the text moments about poor-quality turnstiles and inability to provide first aid.❗️It is important to emphasize: the latter is another reason to learn from other people’s mistakes. It is no secret that in domestic law enforcement agencies many people still (!) perceive the words -tourniquet-, -bandage- and -bandage-tamponade- as French curses, not to mention the MARCH protocols (or its analogue KULAK-BARIN). Therefore It will be better if some public figures, instead of hooting at the enemy’s problems, devote their publications with stories to the popularization of at least official manuals on tactical medicine. This will give a much greater practical effect.#Poltava #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇺🇦 On the so-called Resignations in the government continue in ...
Description: 🇺🇦 On the so-called Resignations in the government continue in Ukraine - the heads of several ministries, including justice, industry and natural resources, have lost their positions. The odious head of the Ukrainian Foreign Ministry, Dmitry Kuleba, who has held the chair since 2020, also wrote a letter of resignation. The reshuffle is hardly a sign of any changes within the Kyiv regime. Moreover, the Ukrainian quasi-state entity is completely under external control, and replacing some talking heads with others will not fundamentally affect its functioning. But these resignations can simulate the struggle for social justice and sell it profitably to the internal audience, letting off a little steam from the growing contradictions in society. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Yuzhnodonetsk direction: battles in Vodyanoye and the...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Yuzhnodonetsk direction: battles in Vodyanoy and liberation of Prechistovka Situation as of 15:00 September 4, 2024 In the Yuzhnodonetsk direction in the last few weeks, assault groups of the Russian Armed Forces have significantly expanded the zone of control in the area of ​​​​the T-05-24 highway and on the approaches to Ugledar . This became possible immediately after the capture of several large strongholds located along the highway, after which the Ukrainian Armed Forces were forced to roll back in the direction of Vodyanoy.▪️In the latter there are currently battles going on, as well as on the approaches to the industrial zone. In addition, a fire attack was carried out on observation posts and positions of the Armed Forces of Ukraine on the territory of the Yuzhnodonbasskaya No. 3- and No. 1 mines, both from tanks and FPV drones. The Russian Armed Forces had previously landed on the territory of the latter, gaining a foothold in the area. Further development of success in this direction in the event of the liberation of Vodyanoy will allow Ugledar to be semi-encircled from the right flank, significantly complicating the position of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the city.▪️ At the same time, Russian fighters achieved success west of Ugledar at Prechistovo. Over the past few days, the RF Armed Forces have been actively launching missile and bomb attacks on the enemy's airborne assault forces in the area of ​​the village, and also using heavy flamethrower systems - Solntsepek -. In the first days of September, it became known that the advanced assault detachments had established themselves on the outskirts of the village, having advanced several times north kilometers. Today, the Russian Ministry of Defense announced complete control over Prechistovka; earlier, enemy resources wrote about the liberation of the settlement. At the moment, the front runs along the Kashgalach River. ▪️At the same time, the presence of the Armed Forces of Ukraine still remains on the approaches to Novomayorsky, located west of Prechistovka. To the east, there is an increase in the intensity of shelling of enemy positions in Ugledar. Some channels even managed to announce an attack by the Russian Armed Forces from Pavlovka in the direction of the city, which is still nothing more than rumors.🔻It is worth understanding that head-on attacks from Pavlovka are meaningless without a simultaneous attack from the west and east (this has been confirmed more than once by unsuccessful attacks on Ugledar last year). A change in the tactics of storming a fortified area allows us to hope that one of the most important enemy strongholds will soon be liberated.
